name: Planet Painter
description:
In this game you control a space ship that can pick up lifeforms from orbit. The planet is a small island in the vast emptiness of space. You will be ready for departure when 100% of life is picked up. The planet will turn from green to gray where that happens.

Controls (2 schemes)

  • Wheel up/down for speed, Mouse left/right button to turn.
  • A/X for speed up/down, 8/P for turning left/right.

Go to the github.io link to play the online version. Windows and Linux builds can be played directly from itch.io. Online-build needs to be hosted through a webserver, so just go to the github.io link to play it:

https://eternalnooblet.github.io/PlanetPainter/
